pageContext.claim: “President Obama commuted the sentence of Chelsea Manning, who leaked countless sensitive and classified documents to WikiLeaks, perhaps and others, but horrible, horrible thing that he did -- commuted the sentence and perhaps pardoned.”
pageContext.analysis: In a puzzlement, Trump incorrectly adds that Obama "perhaps pardoned" Manning. Perhaps that is because he had retweeted an incorrect comment on Twitter that Obama had pardoned Manning. Of note: during the 2016 campaign, Trump declared "I love Wikileaks" after the organization leaked damaging information on the Hillary Clinton campaign.
